verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that when <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to them, <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%>

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> You <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>falsely:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> not into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%>

But <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%> <S%H5496>sets<s%> you on against us, for to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that they might put us to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H1540>carry<s%> us away <S%H1540>captives<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

So <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that were <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had been <S%H5080>driven,<s%> to <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

<S%H853>Even<s%> <S%H1397>men,<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had <S%H5117>left<s%> with <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah.<s%>

So they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> for they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> thus <S%H935>came<s%> they even to <S%H8471>Tahpanhes.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> them in the <S%H4423>clay<s%> in the brick <S%H4404>kiln,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3064>Judah;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> on <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> that I have <S%H2934>hid;<s%> and he shall <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H8237>royal<s%> <S%H8237>pavilion<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

And when he <S%H935>comes,<s%> he shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and deliver such as are for <S%H4194>death<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> and such as are for <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> them, and <S%H7617>carry<s%> them away <S%H7617>captives:<s%> and he shall <S%H5844>array<s%> himself with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5844>puts<s%> on his <S%H899>garment;<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

He shall <S%H7665>break<s%> also the <S%H4676>images<s%> of <S%H1053>Bethshemesh,<s%> that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall he <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
